The hostel fee for a year amounts to Rs.90000

patterns: Tell me about IT in cbit
responses: At CBIT, the Information Technology (IT) department offers a diverse curriculum covering key IT subjects such as programming, data structures, networks, cybersecurity, and software engineering. With a focus on practical learning, the department provides well-equipped labs and a comprehensive library. Students often engage in clubs, workshops, and industry-related events, benefiting from strong ties to IT companies for internships and placements.To know more about IT,you can visit CBIT IT

CBIT's Chemical Engineering Department, founded in 1995, offers a prestigious B.Tech program, accredited by the NBA, with a 60-seat intake. It prioritizes practical learning, industry collaborations, and multidisciplinary research initiatives, aiming to establish a 'Smart Centre for Green Engineering and Technology-Research' to enhance collaborative research and skill development in niche areas of chemical engineering.

• Computer Science and Engineering
  • Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
  • CSE(Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
  • CSE(Internet of Things and Cyber Security Including Block Chain Technology)
  • Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

The mechanical engineering department at CBIT always strives to stay at the forefront of technological innovation. Our department lives and swears by technological developments that are shaking the very foundations of conventional wisdom. If there is an existing solution to a real life problem in the field of mechanical engineering, our students know of it. And if there doesn't exist any, you can find them engrossed in finding one.

CBIT's BE in Electronics and Communication is the ideal course for those who are keenly interested in circuits, network theory and how the modern-day electronic gadgets function.For this department will not only prepare you for jobs in the best corporate companies in the electronics industry, but also sets the tone for a scintillating career in academic research.

CBIT's Biotechnology Department, founded in 2005, cultivates diverse talent through robust education, well-equipped labs, and a dedicated faculty. With a five-domain focus, hands-on training, and strong industry connections, it boasts a 95%+ placement rate, propelling students into top companies, esteemed universities, and entrepreneurial ventures.

The EEE Department at CBIT operates with one eye on excellence and the other one on the future. This is because we know just how fast the world is changing. As such, our students are armed with not just the traditional knowledge and wisdom in the field of electrical engineering, but also with an interdisciplinary perspective that helps them work in tandem with other specializations in the world of technology and science.

The Civil Engineering department at CBIT has to shoulder a major responsibility – that of producing the most gifted builders of tomorrow. And in this department, we take this responsibility very seriously. Officially recognized by Osmania University as a research center, the Civil Engineering department has been at the forefront of cutting edge research in this field. The numerous accolades and scholarship grants received by this department stand testimony to its deeply ingrained brilliance.

Chaitanya Bharathi Institute of Technology (CBIT) is a prestigious engineering college located in Gandipet, Hyderabad, Telangana, India.

CBIT offers a range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs and is known for its commitment to quality education and innovation.

For more information, you can visit the CBIT website: CBIT Website

patterns: tell me about sports in cbit
responses: Sports at CBIT are vibrant and diverse, encompassing traditional games like basketball, cricket, and football, as well as niche sports like badminton and table tennis. The college actively hosts inter-college tournaments and intra-college competitions, fostering teamwork and healthy competition. Students also have access to regional and national level events. The Chaitanya Kreeda club specifically caters to sports enthusiasts, offering a platform for engagement and skill development in various athletic pursuits.For more infomation, you can visit CBIT SPORTS

patterns: tell me about the cbit library
responses: CBIT boasts an extensive library offering a plethora of books, journals, and technical resources. With dedicated discussion rooms and a resource center, it provides an enriching environment for both individual study and collaborative learning.For more details, you can visit the library's website at CBIT Library

patterns: tell me about the labs in cbit it
tell me about the labs in cbit
responses: CBIT's Department of IT Infrastructure houses specialized labs equipped with cutting-edge technology. These labs support practical learning in programming, networking, and database management. They provide a hands-on environment for research, projects, and application of theoretical knowledge in real-world scenarios.For more information, you can visit CBIT LABS

patterns: what clubs are there in cbit
tell me about clubs in cbit
what are the clubs there in cbit
responses: At CBIT,holistic student development is prioritized. Joining professional bodies provides a platform for skill enhancement, keeping students abreast of industry trends and fostering valuable networking opportunities. Additionally, active participation in various clubs within the institute allows students to explore and express their creativity, building team spirit and honing interpersonal communication skills. This multifaceted approach not only enriches academic experiences but also contributes to the overall growth of a student's personality. Explore the diverse clubs at CBIT Clubs to unlock opportunities for personal and professional development beyond the classroom.
